eyBuildLib : Routines

ebSendError( )

NAME

ebSendError( ) - send error message to error page

SYNOPSIS

int ebSendError
    (
    int    errnum,            /* http error number */
    char * errfmt,            /* error message */
           ...
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine redirect url to error page, adn list error detail specified by errfmt and so on.

RETURNS

OK/ERROR
